import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";// Soft UI Dashboard PRO React helper functions
import pxToRem from"assets/theme/functions/pxToRem";var light=colors.light,text=colors.text,dark=colors.dark;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;var size=typography.size;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{minWidth:pxToRem(160),minHeight:"unset",padding:"".concat(pxToRem(4.8)," ").concat(pxToRem(16)),borderRadius:borderRadius.md,fontSize:size.sm,color:text.main,transition:"background-color 300ms ease, color 300ms ease","&:hover, &:focus, &.Mui-selected, &.Mui-selected:hover, &.Mui-selected:focus":{backgroundColor:light.main,color:dark.main}}}};
